text: 33:6 Aisaia 56:10-11; Esekiel 3:18; 18:20; 18:24Eghtɨ eghuvir gumazitam apanibar gantɨ me izɨtɨ, a ikiangsɨzim damu sɨgham giveraghan koghtɨ, apaniba izɨ gumazibav soghtɨ me arɨghiregham. Eghtɨ gumazamizir uan arazir kuraba akɨrizir puvatɨgha ariaghire, kar men osɨmtɨzim puvatɨ. Kar eghuvir gumazir kamɨn osɨmtɨzim, a ikiangsɨzim me ganɨngizir puvatɨ.
